event.title: FTF talk at CELF ELC in Grenoble

body.p: Unlike proprietary software, the Free Software requirements are not about remuneration, but about maintaining the Freedom of users of the software to use, study, modify and distribute. That places some interesting requirements on manufacturers of devices that use this software.
Adriaan de Groot talks about Software Licensing and compliance at this years Embedded Linux Conference in Grenoble, France.
